name: Compression
description:
ATTENTION: IF YOU ENCOUNTER PERFORMENCE ISSUES LIKE LOW FRAMERATE, TROUBLING MOVEMENT OR BAD PHYSICS I RECOMMEND YOU DOWNLOAD THE EXECUTABLE FILE WICH IS AVAILABLE DOWN BELOW FOR ALL PC PLATFORMS.

NOTE: For better experience, it is recommended to download the executable version of the game.

Ludum Dare #42

You are playing as a byte of information, wich has to find a spot to settle, because the useer decided to perform a 4 leveled compression of the file. Do it as fust as possible, avoiding compression errors.

Recommended to be played in fullmode!

Fear the fail and have fun!
